So the story so far is that Yugo-san dont want to be a part of it anymore, so she does it with other sex-advisers and got them to gangbang her. She then wants to do it with her husband without a condom but her husband, Shun, didn’t want to. Not being able to satisfy herself with him she went out to see Saku. Who made her say that what she’s doing isn’t for her husband anymore and that she just wants to have sex herself. She then made an excuse saying her husband is in the fault here, that she has been trying hard so it should be ok for her to do what she wants right? She then proceed to have sex with him with an intention to have kid. She was surprised seeing Shun out of the apartment with his stuff and said they should take time away from each other. She then asks for his reasons for this by saying something like “do you hate it when I do it with someone other than you for you!?”, “I have been trying hard so far so why!?”. Basically making excuses for herself on the way.

To further clarify, Shun gave permission for sex counseling but was still neglectful and wasn't always honest. Rika got 'advice' which she used to try to spice up their sex life, like wearing the lingerie in Ch. 1 (Zenpen). But Shun became so busy with work for months that he would come back home late at night and go right to sleep without satisfying Rika (and in end of Ch. 1 we see her having dinner by herself). When she came back from the orgy, Shun pretended to not know better but also apologized for his frequent absence before he fucked her brains out in Ch. 2 (Chuuhen). He even played along with Rika's lies before dumping her after her second night out. Yugo was only ever trying to do his job, looking out for Rika, and always kept Shun in the loop.

In fact, hubbie Shun has known about Toma/Saku since the very beginning. While Rika is out drinking with Yugo, Toma, and Saku, where she meets the young duo for the first time, she decides to let loose with the alcohol. Yugo feels uneasy and calls Shun, tells him about the situation. Yugo warns Shun about how things are escalating and wants to make sure once more, but Shun says it's fine. He'll be waiting for the update later. Toma and Saku seduce Rika into having an orgy, Yugo later joins in and secretly begins to stream. Shun is watching the stream while eating dinner. They go at it all night until morning, Rika goes back, panic lies that she was out late with friends. Shun goes along with lie and says one of her classmates contacted him, Rika's confused but relieved and goes along with the lie. Shun then fucks Rika madly and she loves it. tl;dr Rika craved more pleasure, Yugo tried to defuse the situation, Shun enabled Rika's descent, Yugo wanted no more, Rika turned to the duo
Noice, not everyday that you get these kinds of ending.

Story up until this chapter (cont.): Rika comes home seeing her hubbie Shun leaving, he's known all along. At first he wants to separate. Sex counseling had the opposite effect on their marriage. She doesnt get it and tries to plead with him to know why he's really leaving. She doesn't want to break up. Is it because seeing guys is too much for him? Is it because he has someone else he likes? Shun says it's do let her do whatever she wants, bcuz she always has someone to "consult" with or to have sex with. "If you want another reason then think about it on your own later." Forget separation. Shun wants to break up. Rika is devastated. Later Toma (one of her sex advisors) gets a call from someone. It seems he knows about her break up. Other person on the phone has arrived somewhere else. Cut to Rika's apartment where she's living like a slob and looking like a mess. Part B will come out this Dec. (author's notes).

Story up until this chapter (cont.): Fast forward later she's still doing sex counseling but lying it's still with Yugo. Rika gets sluttier and starts doing it with multiple guys at behest of her new sex advisors. She later wants to have raw sex and tries to ask her hubbie to have a kid but he doesnt want one (but she bought pills just in case). That night she goes out to meet Saku and wants raw sex. This goes beyond sex counseling and she becomes a little bit delusional but she wants it so bad that she accepts whatever so it becomes just straight up cheating ("as long as my husband doesn't know it's fine"). They do it throughout night until morning.

Story up this chapter: wife Rika has been unsatisfied with her sex life with her hubbie Shun. Both agree to allow her to try sex counseling with sex advisor Yugo (so sex with permission of hubbie), Rika gets hooked onto it. At first their sex life becomes better but Shun starts to get busy, she gets lonely. Soon she gets two more sex advisors Toma and Saku without hubbie consent, but Yugo has been recording their plays and keeping in touch with hubbie, who knows of Rika's infidelity. Later Yugo breaks it off with Rika and tells hubbie about it without Rika knowing. Rika is frustrated so she goes to Saku and Toma and has new advisors behind her hubbie's back.
